fieldDescription: Skips weapon groups that are currently out of ammo.
Navigate left in the core campaign menu; open the Character tab from Fleet, open Cargo from Map.
Navigate right in the core campaign menu; open the Refit tab from fleet, open Intel from Map.
Navigate the sub tabs in Cargo, Intel, and Planets.
Navigate the sub tabs in Cargo, Intel, and Planets.
If enabled, the following settings will be used to add additional controls when interacting with planets, stations, fleets, and the like.
If the interact option indicator is being shown when it shouldn't, this key can be used to temporarily disable it.
If the indicator will wrap around to the other side at the beginning or end.
Color used for the arrow indicating the current selection.
If enabled, the following settings will be used to add additional controls for the hotbar while flying through normal/hyperspace.
If the selection will wrap around to the other side at the beginning or end.
Pauses campaign when controls are inputted in rapid succession.
If at least two controls are pressed within this span of seconds, it'll count as consecutive. Setting to 1 will pause on left or right input.
Unpauses campaign when the hotbar selection is confirmed, but only when paused by being controlled.
Indicators will fade if not controlled.
Indicators will fade after this amount of seconds have passed since it was controlled.
Once the indicator disappears the selection will be reset. The next time the hotbar is scrolled through it will start at 1.
Color used for the 4 arrows indicating the current selection.
If the indicators should be rendered above tooltips. As of v0.97a, the vanilla "below tooltips above UI" only renders correctly until a menu tab is opened (i.e. Character/Map/Refit/etc).
Debug logging.
